name: Aripiprazole Lauroxil
summary: A long-acting injectable prodrug of aripiprazole used in the treatment of schizophrenia, available under brand names like Aristada.
description: Aripiprazole lauroxil is a long-acting intramuscular atypical antipsychotic indicated for the treatment of schizophrenia. It is a prodrug that is converted into aripiprazole after injection, providing sustained therapeutic effects over 4–8 weeks depending on dose. It works as a partial agonist at dopamine D2 and serotonin 5-HT1A receptors and an antagonist at serotonin 5-HT2A receptors.

contraindications: Known hypersensitivity to aripiprazole or formulation components

sections.text: Converted into aripiprazole after intramuscular injection, acting as a partial agonist at dopamine D2 and serotonin 5-HT1A receptors, and antagonist at serotonin 5-HT2A receptors.

adult.start: 441 mg, 662 mg, or 882 mg every 4 weeks; 882 mg every 6 weeks; or 1064 mg every 8 weeks
adult.titrate: Adjust dose or interval based on clinical response

sections.geriatric: Same dosing; monitor closely for adverse effects
sections.hepatic_impairment: No adjustment in mild/moderate; use caution in severe

items: Prefilled syringes for intramuscular injection: 441 mg, 662 mg, 882 mg, 1064 mg

sections.text: Therapeutic levels achieved within days if oral or Initio loading regimen is used; duration of effect depends on dosing interval (4–8 weeks).

sections.black_box: Increased mortality in elderly patients with dementia-related psychosis.
other: Requires oral aripiprazole or Aristada Initio overlap for initiation

sections.pregnancy: Use if benefits outweigh risks; possible neonatal EPS or withdrawal.
sections.lactation: Excreted in breast milk; monitor infant.
sections.geriatrics: Monitor for orthostatic hypotension and sedation.

sections.text: Not applicable for LAI; drug levels decline gradually after discontinuation.

items: Provides multiple dosing interval options for patient preference and adherence.
Oral overlap or Aristada Initio regimen required for initiation.
Fewer metabolic effects than some other LAIs.

seo.title: Aripiprazole Lauroxil: Dosing, Uses, Side Effects
seo.description: Detailed guide to aripiprazole lauroxil, a long-acting injectable antipsychotic for schizophrenia, including dosing intervals and safety.
